timeline.bodyText: Shall we have the regex as a constant
timeline.author: mefarazath

timeline.bodyText: Any reason why we are fixing a depricated method? is it still in use?
timeline.author: janakamarasena

timeline.bodyText:
If we do not allow changing the regex, it would be user friendly if we say why the scope is invalid rather than saying it should adhere to a specific regex.
Something like "Invalid scope name. A scope name cannot contain special characters x,y or z"
Do we have plans to make this regex configurable?
